thi-ap13:0.3_0: Hearing his speech, the most senior monk, the workers, and the workers.
thi-ap13:3.1_0: since the legal procedure of ejection was
thi-ap13:4.2_0: I comprehended all states of existence.
thi-ap13:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
thi-ap13:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
thi-ap13:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Makhādeva Mango Grove.
thi-ap13:9.1_0: Brahmadatta, the senior monks, and a third part of the senior monks.
